metadata_version.description: The version of the file format.

dynamic.description: A list of core metadata fields that are dynamicly calculated.

platform.description: The platforms supported by the distribution.

supported_platform.description: The platforms for which a binary distribution was compiled.

summary.description: A one-line summary of about the distribution.

description.description: A longer description of the distribution that can run to several paragraphs.

description_content_type.description: The content type of the description. In the same format as the HTTP Content-Type header field.

author.description: The name of the author of the distribution. Additional contact information may be provided.

author_email.description: The email address of the author or maintainer. It can contain a name and email address in the legal forms for a RFC 822 ``From:`` header.

maintainer.description: The name of the maintainer. Additional contact information may be provided.

maintainer_email.description: The email address of the maintainer. It can contain a name and email address in the legal forms for a RFC 822 ``From:`` header.

license.description: Text indicating the license covering the distribution where the license is not a selection from the “License” Trove classifiers.

license_expression.description: A valid SPDX license expression indicating the license covering the distribution.

license_file.description: Paths to license files relative to the project root directory.

classifier.description: A list of Trove classifiers that describe the nature of the distribution.

requires_dist.description: A list of projects required by the distribution.

requires_python.description: The Python version for which the distribution is intended.

requires_external.description: A list of external dependencies required by the distribution.

label.description: The label for the project URL.

url.description: The URL for the project URL.

project_url.description: A mapping of arbitrary text labels to additional URLs relevant to the project.

provides_extra.description: A list of optional features provided by the distribution.

import_name.description: A list of exclusive import names provided by the distribution.

import_namespace.description: A list of exclusive import namespaces provided by the distribution.

provides_dist.description: A list of project names provided by the distribution.

obsoletes_dist.description: A list of project names that are obsoleted by the distribution.

home_page.description: The home page of the project.

download_url.description: The URL for the distribution's download page.

requires.description: A list of projects required by the distribution.

provides.description: A list of projects provided by the distribution.

obsoletes.description: A list of projects that are obsoleted by the distribution.
